Thane Bettany https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thane_Bettany 0 Thane William Howard Hardcastle Christopher Bettany (28 May 1929 – c. November 2015) was an English actor and former dancer. He was the father of film actor Paul Bettany. Thane_William_Howard_Hardcastle_Christopher_Bettany ( 28_May_1929 – c. November_2015 ) was an_English_actor and former_dancer . He was the_father of film_actor_Paul_Bettany .
